attributes.action: reject tradition and to do all in his power to disallow Michael Martin, the outgoing Speaker of the House of Commons, from being made a Peer and being granted a seat in the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin's political career has come to an ignominious end. Let it rest there. The tradition by which the outgoing Speaker is automatically promoted to the House of Lords is outdated, iniquitous and, in this particular case, quite unjustifiable. For this man to become a Peer would be to reward him even further for his failure.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
